text:
Alex Rodriguez is no match for Jennifer Lopez when it comes to working out. The former MLB star admits that in the game of fitness – his lady is the one to beat. “We work out together all the time, “ he told E! News on Friday, August 11, at the grand opening of the UFC Gym in Kendall, Florida. “She is a fitness enthusiast and she’s a much better athlete than me.”

CLICK FOR FULL GALLERY

VIEW GALLERY Alex says that Jennifer is a better athlete than he is Photo: Instagram/@alexrodriguez

Alex, 42, said that Jennifer, 47, has her past to thank for that. “She’s a former track star from junior high.” When asked if Jennifer, who he’s been dating since March, will make an appearance at the new facility, the baseball correspondent replied, “She’ll be here. She goes to TruFusion. She does all types of workouts which I don’t try to keep up.” Last week, Jennifer showed off her intense leg day workout in NYC with fitness trainer David Kirsch before heading to the set of Shades of Blue. When asked about his lady’s work ethic, Alex couldn’t help but to sing her praises.

A post shared by Alex Rodriguez (@arod) on Aug 11, 2017 at 5:08pm PDT

MORE: Alex admits that he gets mistaken for Jennifer's bodyguard

“I think humility, work ethic, what an incredible daughter and mother she is and just a great team player,” he said about the mother-of-two. “I’ve never seen anyone work and have the type of work ethic she does.” While Alex didn’t have Jennifer by his side during the opening of the gym, he had two more of his special ladies in her place. The baseball star took to his Instagram to share a picture of him and his daughters Natasha, 12, and Ella, nine,” showing off their boxing moves “Tashi? Ella? Can’t we talk this out instead #DuckandcoverDad.”
title: Alex Rodriguez says Jennifer Lopez is a workout enthusiast and 'better athlete than me'
